name: Verse Technology
description:
Fito is a gamified fitness tracker and your workout buddy, in the form of a cute little bear.
• Set exercise goals (like working out 3 days a week or running 100km a month), and Fito will automatically track your streak. If you encounter situations like your period, illness, or travel, you can use the Streak Shield to protect it.
• Record your workouts in 3 ways: 1. Automatically sync data from Apple Watch and other fitness trackers. 2. Use Fito to record over 80 types of exercises. 3. If you forget to log a workout or your watch has a low battery, you can manually add entries in Fito.
• Supports GPS tracking for cycling and running, and generates 3D route videos.
• Supports over 300 gym routines to help you view and record your exercises.
